document_data.name: Hrothgar
document_data.mainbody: '''Hrothgar''' was a [[human]] adventurer from [[Easthaven]] within the [[Ten Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Description: The soldier was a powerfully built man who wore heavy armor, like [[plate mail]].
document_data.Personality: Hrothgar spent many years traveling and collecting trophies from legendary beasts, such as a [[gorgon]] and a [[mind flayer]]. He was known for helping anyone in need and had found a strong place in the community of Easthaven.

History.Death: Hrothgar was killed when the expedition was attacked by [[frost giant]]s in [[Kuldahar Pass]].
